name: Tim Medina
text: Hey Roy!Good to see another pinoy interested in django. (You might want to join the \[google group of pinoy django users\]\[1\])About your problem, you might want to take a look at \[ this\]\[2\].\[Tim\]\[3\][1]: http://djangoph.com[2]: http://docs.djangoproject.com/en/dev/topics/http/urls/#reverse[3]: http://devblog.timmedina.com/
